\- Flavor Description: Natural and Lightly Acidic. Medium-Dry (demi-sec) Boxed Red Wine. ‚ÄúWine‚Äù flavor has a Mild Vinegar-like\* note with Lighter notes of a Tart Red Grape. Moderately Light Bodied with Somewhat Dry but Overall Smooth Mouthfeel. 

​

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: Mild Vinegar\* Note attached to Wine

\- Wine Flavor is on the cusp of a Red Wine Vinegar vs Red Wine

\- Not a Full Bodied $50 bottle of Red Wine ‚Äì More like $13.00

\- Light Grape Flavor attached to wine is not an Artificial Purple ‚ÄúConcord‚Äù or Candy Grape

\- No noticeable ‚ÄúWarming‚Äù Effect or Harsh Bitter Tannin
